actions.text: Amendment SA 2996, under the order of 2/2/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 13.
Amendment SA 2996 proposed by Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2996 proposed by Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 2953.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2996, under the order of 2/2/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 13.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2996, under the order of 2/2/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 13.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require each agency to repeal or amend 1 or more rules before issuing or amending a rule.
